description: Gets information about triggers configured for a repository.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository for which the trigger is configured.

nested_items.name: configurationId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID for the trigger.

nested_items.name: triggers
nested_items.description: The JSON block of configuration information for each trigger.

nested_items.name: destinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource that is the target for a trigger (for example, the ARN of a topic in Amazon SNS).

nested_items.name: customData
nested_items.description: Any custom data associated with the trigger to be included in the information sent to the target of the trigger.

nested_items.name: branches
nested_items.description: The branches to be included in the trigger configuration. If you specify an empty array, the trigger applies to all branches.

nested_items.name: events
nested_items.description: The repository events that cause the trigger to run actions in another service, such as sending a notification through Amazon SNS.
